name: Hentai Maze
description:
Welcome to the exciting world of the game "Hentai Maze"! In this game, your task is to control the ball and find the way to the exit. With 48 levels, each of which becomes more difficult, new puzzles and traps, all so that you don't get bored.

Your goal? Compete with the timer to complete each maze before the time runs out. Successful completion of the level is rewarded with the power of love. There are also love power tokens scattered on each level, find them all!

Unlock beautiful pictures to the girl by giving them the earned power of love!

But that's not all. "Hentai Maze" is full of achievements waiting to be unlocked. As you progress through the game, accept the challenge and strive to overcome each challenge. Test your reflexes, memory and problem solving abilities in this exciting race against time.

With great pictures of girls, addictive gameplay, great music and a wide selection of achievements to unlock, "Hentai Maze" will capture you for several hours. Ready to dive into this epic maze adventure? Pull on your virtual running shoes and run through the mazes waiting for you!

48 mazes with lots of puzzles are waiting for you;

24 beautiful pictures of girls have not been opened yet;

Great music not listened to;

Many achievements are not open for your Steam;

What are you waiting for?
